articles.title: Holocaust survivor Eva Schloss, stepsister of Anne Frank, dies at 96
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — Auschwitz survivor Eva Schloss, the stepsister of teenage diarist Anne Frank and a tireless educator about the horrors of the Holocaust, has died. She was 96.
